title: "Team-mates" which take kills and then go die and die and die?
body:
They get a few kills, then either A. die 1 for 1 every time, or B, Die over and over again. 

They also take cs from the people which are doing well..

How do you deal with it?

replies.body: There is no counter to stupidity
